Actions.Text: REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION

Title: Prohibits co-location of a charter school in a public school building in a city school district in a city having a population of one million or more inhabitants; repealer
Summary: Prohibits co-location of a charter school in a public school building in a city school district in a city having a population of one million or more inhabitants.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to prohibiting co-location of a charter school in a public school building in a city school district in a city having a population of one million or more inhabitants; and to repeal certain provisions of the education law related thereto
